picked_headlines.summary: Open-source AI assistant for League of Legends offers audio coaching via screenshots and voice queries.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This headline bridges the gap between gaming and AI technology, appealing to both tech enthusiasts and stakeholders interested in AI applications.

picked_headlines.summary: Guide on evaluating AI engineering tools with data-driven methods for effective adoption and ROI.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides valuable insights for both engineers and management, emphasizing the importance of data-driven decision-making in AI tool adoption.

digest:
- *Real-time collaboration*: Tandem is a **real-time collaborative editor** with AI integration, offering features like version history and document sharing. Check it out at https://github.com/lmanchu/tandem/tree/v3.
- *AI memory discussion*: Explore methods for giving local AI models **long-term memory** using Vector DBs and custom memory modules. Join the discussion at https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46252809.
- *Langchain fix*: A fix for **multithreading race condition** in Langchain's shell output ensures correct stderr capture in Python 3.10. More details at https://github.com/langchain-ai/langchain/commit/54241f4d06949dee46a4522a0fac5a725202a50b.
- *Weekly optimism*: Discover breakthroughs in **space solar power**, neuroscience, aging research, and AI advancements in math competitions in the Weekly Dose of Optimism #173 at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-173.
